code:
[BEGIN]
module TopModule(
    input logic clk,
    input logic reset,
    output logic [31:0] q
);
    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (reset) begin
            q <= 32'h1;
        end else begin
            q <= {q[30:0], q[0] ^ q[1] ^ q[21] ^ q[31]};
        end
    end
endmodule
[DONE]
